duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute strategic communication plans to support the mission and objectives of the Army.
Provide executive communications support to senior leaders, including speech writing, talking points, and presentations.
Oversee and author internal communication materials such as articles for the intranet, talking points, and content for Town Halls.
Utilize innovative strategies to inspire and progress key strategic communication goals.
Guide the client to inform key audiences through words, images, and sound.
Develop and produce a variety of internal and external communication materials and media that supports the Army.
Collaborate with team members, stakeholders, and clients to amplify the accomplishments and mission of Army clients.
Oversee all aspects of oral and written communications to nurture relationships with team members, stakeholders, and clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Communications, Public Relations, or a related field (Master's preferred)
